snippet: U.S.C. Athletic Director Pat Haden reiterated his backing of Coach Lane Kiffin, who has been booed by restless crowds and has found himself in the middle of another controversy.
abstract: University of Southern California athletic director Pat Haden reiterates his backing of football coach Lane Kiffin, who has been booed by restless crowds and has found himself in the middle of another controversy.
lead_paragraph: U.S.C. Athletic Director Pat Haden reiterated his backing of Coach Lane Kiffin, who has been booed by restless crowds and has found himself in the middle of another controversy.

headline.main: U.S.C. Coach Has Support From Boss, if Not the Fans
headline.print_headline: U.S.C. Coach Has Support From Boss, if Not the Fans
